import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { addTeachers, fetchTeachers } from "../Utilis/handleTechBorrowers"; function Teachers() { const [TeachId, setTeachId] = useState(""); const [Name, setName] = useState(""); const [Department, setDepartment] = useState(""); const [Email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [Book_id, setBookid] = useState(""); const [isUpdating, setIsUpdating] = useState(false); const [teachers, setTeachers] = useState([]); const handleAdd = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newTeacher = { TeachId: TeachId, Name: Name, Department: Department, Email: Email, Book_id: Book_id, }; await addTeachers(newTeacher); }; useEffect(() => { fetchTeachers(setTeachers); }, []); const Update = async(TeachId,Name,Department,Email,Book_id)=>{ setUsn(Teach); setName(Name); setYear(Year); setEmail(Email); setBookid(Book_id); setIsUpdating(true); } const handleUpdate = async (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); const updateStudent = { USN:USN, Name:Name, Year:Year, Email:Email, Book_id:Book_id }; updateStudents(USN,updateStudent); setIsUpdating(false); } const handleDelete = () => {}; return (
